item.title: Copy of Breaking Into QA in Israel
item.description: Curious about how to start a career in QA in Israel, but donâ€™t know where to begin? Join us for an open and honest conversation with a seasoned QA professional whoâ€™s been in the field for years. Weâ€™ll talk about: â€“ What QA actually looks like in real life (not just in job descriptions) â€“ What skills really matter when you're just starting out â€“ What hiring managers are actually looking for â€“ And of course â€” you'll get to ask all your questions! After the talk, stick around for some casual mingling â€” a chance to chat, ask more questions, and connect with fellow newcomers to QA and tech. Whether you're taking your first steps into tech or looking to switch into QA â€” this meetup is for you. Come as you are, bring your curiosity, and letâ€™s break in â€” together. Igor Goldshmidt - ð—¤ð˜‚ð—®ð—¹ð—¶ð˜ð˜† ð—˜ð—»ð—´ð—¶ð—»ð—²ð—²ð—¿ð—¶ð—»ð—´ ð—¦ð˜ð—¿ð—®ð˜ð—²ð—´ð—¶ð˜€ð˜, an innovator, the architect of test solutions. International speaker and blogger. Also, he is a â€œbigâ€ activist in the test community with a global goal to improve quality assurance engineering. Today he is a Head of QA in a French-Israeli travel tech startup Sweet Inn.

item.title: How to Get Hired in Tech: Real advice from olim
item.description: Join us for a special evening hosted by Gvahim and Tech & Talk, where two successful olimâ€”now working as a front-end developer and as AI expert â€”share their real experiences navigating the Israeli high tech market. Theyâ€™ll open up about the challenges they faced, how they adapted, and what ultimately helped them land their various roles in tech. Whether youâ€™re job hunting or just getting started, this is your chance to hear what actually worksâ€”from olim whoâ€™ve done it. Event Details: Date: Tuesday 22 July Time: 18:30â€“21:00 Location: Tech and Talk, MATAM, Haifa Language: English ðŸŽ¯ Who Should Attend: New olim looking for their first high-tech job in Israel or to continue building their careers in tech New olim looking to transition into high-tech ðŸ“ Agenda: 18:30â€“18:45 - Networking with attendees, Gvahim team, and enjoying refreshments 18:45â€“19:00 - Intro about Gvahim, Tech and Talk & event partners 19:00-20:00 â€“Panel with 2 successful olim who work as experts in High-Tech Our 2 olim will share their journeys breaking into Israeli tech Practical advice about job search, real challenges, and breakthrough moments 20:00â€“20:30 | Audience Q&A 20:30â€“21:00 | Wrap-Up & Networking A chance to connect with the speakers and fellow attendees âœ… Why Attend? Get honest, real-world insights Learn what helped other olim succeed Grow your professional network in a supportive olim community

item.title: Professional integration into the Israeli education system
item.description: Hereâ€™s What Awaits You at the Event: Insightful talk on how the Israeli education system works Step-by-step guide to entering the teaching profession Overview of training programs tailored for new educators Inspiring panel with immigrant teachers and students If youâ€™d like to explore your professional opportunities, please bring your diplomas and grade transcripts.
